result.reason: Application hangs on SSH authentication failure, likely due to unhandled modal dialogs or blocking waits on the external Putty process.
result.approach: Investigate SSH connection logic in PuttyBase.cs. Ensure that if the external Putty process prompts for a password (due to wrong credentials) or fails, the main application detects this state or times out gracefully instead of blocking the UI thread.
